identity.name: AquaFlow Manager
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Operational Clarity) with Dark Sidebar (Admin Authority)

layout.spacing: Generous (p-6 to p-12) for Admin, Compact (p-2 to p-4) for Mobile Scanner

login.layout: Split screen: Left side branding/image (60%), Right side form (40%)
login.visuals: Use 'login_background' with a slate-900/50 overlay on the left. Clean white form on right.

admin_dashboard.layout: Sidebar Navigation (Fixed Left) + Main Content Area
key_elements: Stats Row (Total Sales, Active Staff, Today's Visitors)

receptionist_dashboard.left_panel: Ticket Selection Grid (Big clickable cards for Ticket Types)
receptionist_dashboard.focus: Speed. Minimal clicks. Big touch targets.

scanner_dashboard.visuals: Massive Status Indicator (Full screen background color change on scan result)
scanner_dashboard.elements: QR Scanner Window (Top), Last Scan Result (Middle), Manual Entry (Bottom)

thermal_printing.css_rule: @media print { body * { visibility: hidden; } .printable-ticket, .printable-ticket * { visibility: visible; } .printable-ticket { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 58mm; } }
thermal_printing.layout: Width: 58mm or 80mm. Black and white only. No gradients. High contrast text.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-500 is not used on slate-200 backgrounds. Use text-slate-600 minimum.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all inputs for keyboard-only operation.

motion.type: Reduced. Fast transitions (150ms). No layout shifts.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
